name: Random Quote
short_description: Import a Random Quote from Quotable.io, stoic-quotes.com, Lord of the Rings quotes from The One API, Game of Thrones quotes, Ron Swanson Quotes, Futurama quotes, Monty Python's Flying Circus quotes, anime quotes from Animechan, or quotes from Quotes on Design or API Ninja Quotes. Import random jokes from JokeAPI or Dad jokes from icanhazdadjoke.com. Or, pull a quote from your Roam Research Quotes page!
author: Mark Lavercombe
